      When users click the Decrease price button, the GUI will invoke this method to decrease the prices of selected Book categories, and the new total price will be displayed on the GUI

      The GUI frequently invokes this method to display the total price.
      static double SetOfActions.increaseTotalPrice(java.util.ArrayList<Books> st, boolean nfict, boolean fict)
